title: Australian drone firm reshapes strategy over Google pull-out threat
text: Instructors gaze watchfully from the shade of a tree as men in neon-green vests manipulate hand-held controllers clipped to mobile telephones as they direct drones flying over a vast Sydney field.

title: Google CEO met Australia's prime minister after threatening to pull out its search engine
text: The meeting came after Google last month threatened to block its search engine in Australia, which wants tech giants like Facebook and Google to pay for news.

title: Google Wants to Use Drones to Fight Fires
text: The company is seeking FAA permission to test UAVs on a private property in California.

title: 3 Alphabet Analysts Break Down The Q4 Report
text: For the first time, Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOGL) (NASDAQ: GOOG) stock has crossed above the $2,000 threshold after the search giant reported solid fourth-quarter results. The Alphabet Analysts: Needham analyst Laura Martin maintained a Buy rating on Alphabet shares and upped the price target from $1,800 to $2,500.

title: Google Smashed Top And Bottom-Line Wall Street Estimates
text: On Tuesday, Google's parent Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOG)(NASDAQ: GOOGL) literally crushed it with its last reported quarter. Despite Alphabet announcing that its cloud business remained unprofitable, Google's core advertising business overperformed estimates, leading its stock price to rise 8%.

title: Alphabet's Smash Earnings Report Proves GOOG Stock Can Hit $2,500
text: Big Q4 earnings from Alphabet confirm that GOOG stock will have a strong 2021 showing. The post Alphabet's Smash Earnings Report Proves GOOG Stock Can Hit $2,500 appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Top Buys Today As Tech Giants Like Alphabet And Amazon Move The Markets
text: Alphabet's growth and news of Amazon ﻿﻿founder and CEO, Jeff Bezos, stepping down are moving the markets. With so much happening, our artificial intelligence has found you today's best Top Buys.

title: Google's new subsea cable between the U.S. and Europe is now online
text: Google, together with its partner SubCom, today announced that the company's privately owned Dunant subsea cable between Virginia Beach, Virginia and Saint-Hilaire-de-Riez on the French Atlantic coast is now operational. Google first announced this project, which was named after the first Noble Peach Price winner and founder of the Red Cross, Henry Dunant, back in the […]

title: The Ratings Game: Alphabet stock hits all-time high as analysts boost price targets
text: Analysts are gaga over Alphabet's second straight record quarter of profit, reflecting a booming search business (up 17% to $31.9 billion), YouTube ad sales (up 46% to $6.9 billion), and Google Cloud (up 47% to $3.83 billion).

title: These 2 Nasdaq Tech Titans Are Getting the Stock Market's Attention
text: The broader market is taking a break despite some big earnings reports.

title: As Google fights with Australia, Microsoft promotes Bing and says it wouldn't threaten to leave country
text: Microsoft is wading into a dispute between Google and the Australian government by asserting that it would never threaten to leave the country, as Google did last week.

title: Parler's survival is uncertain after it was dropped by Amazon, Apple and Google
text: During the 2020 election, many conservatives flocked to social media platform Parler decrying Big Tech's labeling of posts. Now the upstart site is struggling.

title: Alphabet shares power S&P 500, Nasdaq; Amazon dips
text: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq climbed on Wednesday, lifted by heavyweight Alphabet Inc's shares after its strong results, while investors counted on more fiscal stimulus to ride out the economic downturn.

title: Amazon and Google reaped big rewards from a rebound in Q4 ad spend
text: Amazon and Alphabet's Google, which posted fourth quarter earnings Tuesday, showed the benefits of a rebound in advertising following a pandemic dip in 2020.

title: Google parent Alphabet's stock spikes thanks to record ad revenue
text: Alphabet's stock price surged Wednesday after the Google parent said it ended 2020 with a bang. Shares in the Silicon Valley titan rose as much as 8.7 percent to $2,086.99 in early trading following a fourth-quarter earnings report that showed a strong comeback in Alphabet's advertising business — even as it faces severe antitrust scrutiny.

title: Why Alphabet Stock Just Jumped
text: The Google parent crushed it on both sales and earnings.

title: Google's Revenue and Profitability Is Getting Ready to Accelerate Again
text: Google Cloud has been a bigger drag on profitability than previously thought, but that's changing quickly.

title: Alphabet (GOOGL) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Beat Estimates
text: Alphabet's (GOOGL) Q4 earnings and revenues beat the Zacks Consensus Estimate. Search, cloud and YouTube businesses remain strong.

title: Google's search rivals say they're committed to Australia if the tech giant quits: 'Our servers could handle it.'
text: Google's rivals say they would be ready to replace the tech giant in Australia if it follows through on threats to shut down its search engine in the country. Google's dispute with the Australian government over new regulation reached boiling point last month, when Google MD for Australia and New Zealand, Mel Silva, warned that proposals forcing it to pay for the news stories it displays could result in search being withdrawn from the country altogether.

title: Amazon gets first $5,000+ stock price target, and Alphabet gets first $3,000 target
text: Analyst Shyam Patil at Susquehanna is now Wall Street's most bullish on Amazon.com Inc.'s stock, after he raised his price target to $5,200 from $4,000, while reiterating his positive rating, in the wake of the e-commerce giant'srecord fourth-quarter results. Patil is also the most bullish on Google-parent Alphabet Inc. , after he boosted his target by 50% to $3,000 from $2,000.

title: GOOGL / GOOG Stock Price Increases Over 6% Pre-Market: Why It Happened
text: The stock price of Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOG) (NASDAQ: GOOGL) is trading at over 6% pre-market today. This is why it happened.

title: Three ways investors can play Big Tech on the back of earnings
text: One Apple supplier could make for a good "catch-up" trade to the Big Tech bounce, says Mark Tepper, president and CEO of Strategic Wealth Partners.

title: YouTube is a powerhouse for Google, with revenue up 46% to almost $7 billion
text: YouTube's advertising revenue hit $6.9 billion in the last quarter of 2020, bouncing back after a pandemic-driven deceleration in the middle of the year.  That's up 46% from the $4.7 billion YouTube pulled in in ad revenue over the same period in 2019, and was driven by both brands ads and direct response ads.

title: Microsoft says it would never ‘threaten to leave' Australia after Google said it could withdraw search engine
text: Microsoft said Wednesday it would never threaten to leave Australia after Google suggested it could pull its widely used search engine from the country.

title: 7 Great Retirement Funds To Consider For Those 50+ and Planning for 2030
text: If you're in your 50s, now can be a good time to review your investments to be sure you have the best retirement funds for your goals. The post 7 Great Retirement Funds To Consider For Those 50+ and Planning for 2030 appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Tech Leads Global Stocks Higher After Amazon and Google Earnings
text: Global stocks are higher, but it's all about tech stocks after big-name results, with more earnings ahead and ADP employment data in focus for later.

title: Google parent Alphabet spikes 7% after smashing 4th-quarter expectations on digital ad sales during the holiday shopping quarter
text: Shares of Google-parent Alphabet rose 7% in pre-market trading on Wednesday after the company posted strong earnings in the holiday shopping quarter, exceeding analyst expectations.  Fourth-quarter revenue rose to $46.43 billion, up 23% from a year ago. Analysts, on average, expected revenue of $44.14 billion.

title: Google's transatlantic Dunant subsea cable opens as cloud sales soar
text: Google's second fully privately-owned subsea cable is now open for business, spanning 3,977 miles from Virginia Beach to France.
